s_synopsis: There is a legend of a powerful weapon known as the "Sword of Dynasty", which is said to hold the strongest power in existence and granting any wish desired by the wielder. The Sword of Dynasty has fallen into the hands of cruel and ruthless fighting warlord S. Geist, who seeks to conquer the world by releasing an ancient sealed beast called the Earth Dragon. Eight warriors have set out to find the Sword of Dynasty for their own personal reasons, their paths now crossing in the battles of this game.
